assignmentText:
Continued from problem, Camping 1 and 2

1) Using the virtual lab, create two solutions, initially at 25C, that, when mixed together in equal volumes, cause the temperature of the mixture to increase from 25C to 60C.

2) Using the virtual lab, create two solutions initially at 25C that, when added to 100ml of water at 25C, will produce a final solution with a temperature of 60C.
